instructions: 以左手邊的 Abstract Group為參考點，準備出發。
目的地就在前方的 IO Industries Inc.。

target_info.display_name: IO Industries Inc.: IO Industries Inc.

companies.name: IO Industries Inc.
companies.description:
IO Industries Inc. designs cutting-edge digital video equipment. Since 1991 we have focused on providing our customers with high performance and high quality solutions for all types of digital video applications.

●  Volumetric Capture  
●  4D Face/Body Scanning  
●  Compact POV Shooting  
●  Machine Vision  
●  Advanced Imaging
●  Resolutions up to 8K/65MP 
●  Frame Rates into the 1000's of fps
companies.categories: 3D Scanning, Aerospace Applications, Animation/Film, Artifical Intelligence (AI), Digital Imaging, High Resolution Technologies, Imaging, Motion Capture Software/Hardware, Scientific Visualization, Virtual Reality Software/Hardware
